trans-unit.source: Represents a base class from which all context items must derive.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en basisklasse elementer må avledes fra som alle konteksten.

trans-unit.source: A context item represents a piece of transient state in a designer.
trans-unit.target: Et element i konteksten representerer en del av midlertidig tilstand i en designer.

trans-unit.source: Context items are managed by a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>, which is part of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> employed by a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner> when representing the workflow model visually.
trans-unit.target: Konteksten elementer som administreres av en <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>, som er en del av den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext>ansatt av en <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner>når som representerer modellen arbeidsflyten skal se visuelt.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager> is returned by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items%2A> property which contains the data that is shared between a host and the designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>returneres av den <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items%2A>som inneholder data som er delt mellom vert og designer.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>

trans-unit.source: This data provides the mechanism needed to hook into subscription and change notification.
trans-unit.target: Disse dataene inneholder mekanisme kreves for å koble til abonnementet og endringsvarsling.

trans-unit.source: Initiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Starter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets the type of item derived from the editing context class.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, henter elementtypen avledet fra klassen redigering kontekst.

trans-unit.source: This is not implemented for the base <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er ikke implementert for base <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>klasse.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItem>

trans-unit.source: Represents a method that is called on the context item before it is stored in the context item manager.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en metode som kalles i konteksten element før den lagres i konteksten elementet manager.

trans-unit.source: The previous item in the context item manager is passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Forrige element i konteksten elementet manager sendes som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: Because items must have default constructors, a default item will be constructed if an item is passed into the context the first time.
trans-unit.target: Fordi elementer må ha standard konstruktører, genereres en standardelement Hvis et element er sendt til konteksten første gang.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref> within which the change is being made.
